multi_topic_discovery.topic_discovery_motivation: Impact: equities; Nvidia earnings lift the S&P 500 to a new record while oil prices decline, modest FX moves and Fed policy expectations influence market sentiment.

category.motivation: The article centers on Nvidia’s earnings release and its impact on the S&P 500, making it a company earnings event.

impact.motivation: The node to evaluate was not specified in the prompt, so I cannot determine the impact of the article on a particular market handle.

time_frame.motivation: The article focuses on immediate market reactions to Nvidia earnings and short‑term price movements.

article_node.title: Global markets are mixed after U.S. stocks surged following Nvidia’s earnings report
article_node.summary: Global markets were mixed after Nvidia’s earnings report, with the S&P 500 hitting a new all‑time high while oil prices fell. European indices saw a split performance, with Germany’s DAX rising and Britain’s FTSE 100 slipping. In China, semiconductor stocks surged on strong earnings, but tech firms in Hong Kong and India faced pressure from consumer cuts and new tariffs.
